name: Concannon Petite Sirah Reserve
description: Deep, inky purple with aromas of blackberry, plum, and hints of chocolate. Full-bodied with firm tannins.

name: Wente Morning Fog Chardonnay
description: Bright citrus and tropical fruit notes with subtle oak influence. Crisp and refreshing.

name: Wente Southern Hills Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Rich black cherry and cassis flavors with hints of vanilla and spice from French oak aging.

name: Steven Kent Lineage
description: Estate-grown Bordeaux blend showcasing the best of Livermore Valley terroir.

name: Steven Kent Small Lot Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Intensely concentrated with dark fruit, cedar, and graphite notes.

name: Murrieta's Well The Spur
description: Bold red blend with notes of ripe plum, dark cherry, and subtle spice.

name: Murrieta's Well The Whip
description: Aromatic white blend with notes of citrus, stone fruit, and subtle floral hints.

name: Darcie Kent Madden Ranch Chardonnay
description: Single-vineyard Chardonnay with bright apple, pear, and subtle butter notes.

name: Darcie Kent Demayo Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Estate Cabernet with layers of blackcurrant, mocha, and fine-grained tannins.

name: McGrail Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Flagship wine with concentrated flavors of black cherry, cassis, and cedar.

name: McGrail Kylie Ryan Chardonnay
description: Elegant Chardonnay with notes of green apple, lemon curd, and toasted oak.

name: Fenestra True Red
description: Classic Livermore red blend with balanced fruit and smooth finish.

name: Fenestra Semillon
description: Rare varietal for California with honeyed notes and crisp acidity.

name: Las Positas Estate Reserve Tempranillo
description: Spanish-style Tempranillo with notes of cherry, leather, and vanilla.

name: Las Positas Petite Sirah
description: Dense and powerful with dark fruit, black pepper, and firm tannins.

name: Garré Vineyard Estate Merlot
description: Soft and velvety with plum, cherry, and hints of chocolate.

name: Garré Vineyard Sangiovese
description: Italian-style wine with bright cherry, herbs, and earthy notes.

name: Longevity Zinfandel
description: Bold and jammy with ripe blackberry, pepper, and spice.

name: Longevity Cabernet Franc
description: Elegant with notes of red currant, violet, and green pepper.

name: Cuda Ridge Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Bordeaux-style Cabernet with structure and aging potential.

name: Cuda Ridge Malbec
description: Deep purple with plum, violet, and cocoa notes.

name: Page Mill Sauvignon Blanc
description: Bright and zesty with grapefruit, lime, and herbal notes.

name: Page Mill Pinot Noir
description: Delicate red with cherry, raspberry, and subtle earthiness.

name: Retzlaff Organic Merlot
description: Certified organic Merlot with pure fruit expression and silky tannins.

name: Retzlaff Estate Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Organic estate Cabernet with dark fruit and savory herbs.

name: Charles R. Vineyards Petite Sirah
description: Big and bold with blackberry, blueberry, and black pepper.

name: Occasio Primitivo
description: Italian-style red with ripe cherry, spice, and smooth finish.

name: Rubino Estates Dolcetto
description: Italian varietal with soft tannins and notes of almond and dark cherry.

name: Ruby Hill Sangiovese
description: Tuscan-inspired wine with bright acidity and cherry notes.

name: Mitchell Katz Falling Star Meritage
description: Bordeaux-style blend from hand-selected vineyard lots.

name: Bent Creek Estate Viognier
description: Aromatic white with peach, apricot, and floral notes.

name: 3 Steves Winery Grenache
description: Rhône-style Grenache with raspberry, strawberry, and white pepper.

name: Del Valle Estate Syrah
description: Full-bodied with notes of blackberry, smoked meat, and black pepper.

name: Dante Robere Vineyards Barbera
description: Italian varietal with bright acidity and cherry-plum flavors.

name: Wood Family Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Estate-grown Cabernet with black fruit, cedar, and tobacco notes.

name: Wood Family Vineyards Chardonnay
description: Barrel-fermented with notes of apple, pear, and vanilla.

name: Rosa Fierro Rosé
description: Crisp and refreshing with strawberry, watermelon, and citrus notes.

name: Nella Terra Sangiovese
description: Super-Tuscan style with red fruit, dried herbs, and firm structure.

name: BoaVentura Portuguese Red Blend
description: Portuguese-style blend with dark fruit, earth, and spice.

name: Bodegas Aguirre Tempranillo
description: Spanish-inspired with cherry, leather, and oak notes.
